Posted By: SyntheticDreamer (9/25/2012 8:02:30 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card won me plenty of matches in my B/G/W deck at the prerelease. This obviously works with enchantments you put on opponents creatures as well, so [stab wound](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=stab wound) and [arrest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=arrest) give you more power too! Put this on my kordoza guildmage and used it as a blocker while I gave my 8/8 vigilant elemental(from [grove of the guardian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=grove of the guardian) ) +1/+1 and intimidate.
  
   
As mentioned already, will work well with rancor, [underworld connections](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=underworld connections), [chronic flooding](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=chronic flooding) and just about everything else.
  
   
Will be stellar in quick aggro decks that are filled with enchantments and really good in draft, because first strike and a guaranteed +1/+1 with room to grow is well worth the single (W) mana.
posts.html:

Put this on my kordoza guildmage and used it as a blocker while I gave my 8/8 vigilant elemental(from grove of the guardian ) +1/+1 and intimidate.

As mentioned already, will work well with rancor, underworld connections, chronic flooding and just about everything else.

Will be stellar in quick aggro decks that are filled with enchantments and really good in draft, because first strike and a guaranteed +1/+1 with room to grow is well worth the single (W) mana.

posts.post_content:
This is a card I can see myself playing at the pre-release this weekend and in alot of drafts this year. If the creature with it on it is not killed this card makes whatever creature a finisher in a deck with alot of blue/white "removal" enchantments.

posts.post_content:
This card won me plenty of matches in my B/G/W deck at the prerelease. This obviously works with enchantments you put on opponents creatures as well, so [stab wound](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=stab wound) and [arrest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=arrest) give you more power too! Put this on my kordoza guildmage and used it as a blocker while I gave my 8/8 vigilant elemental(from [grove of the guardian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=grove of the guardian) ) +1/+1 and intimidate.
  
   
As mentioned already, will work well with rancor, [underworld connections](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=underworld connections), [chronic flooding](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=chronic flooding) and just about everything else.
  
   
Will be stellar in quick aggro decks that are filled with enchantments and really good in draft, because first strike and a guaranteed +1/+1 with room to grow is well worth the single (W) mana.
